price: 13. Goormay waantoobi, waxaana u yimid Rasuul iska cad (Nabi Muxammad).
arabic: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ وَقَدۡ جَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: annā lahumu al-dhik'rā waqad jāahum rasūlun mubīnun
